title: Bug 128359: Incorrect logic when adding a filter to the table on the layout
description: We observed that the dataset initially has 10 records (DataResultA).
OB: When dragging the dataset to the layout and setting another filter (FilterB) on the table,
EB: the actual result is that the result of FilterB is based on DataResultA.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report and add a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set a filter (FilterA) in the dataset, resulting in 6 records in the dataset (DataResultB). 
3. Drag the dataset to the layout and set FilterB on the table.

Expected result: The result of FilterB should be based on DataResultB.
